channel.title: Can't fix client login error
channel.description:
There is a problem with model/ item;location;npc i added public npc;item;location(){} etc to quiet the compiler when a user creates their account plays it etc and they log out that is fine. Then when they log back in using the unmodded client it said "error loading your profile please contact customer service"
and maybe help me fix this. log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.executor.ExecutorFilter). log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.
Anyone who solves this problem will have the right to call themselves a coding master i'm completely stumped :(
using:GazaaScape 562 link:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=494523.0 NO MODS WERE MADE TO THE SERVER Modded client to change ip but that's not affecting anything

item.title: Can't fix client login error
item.dc:creator: @codejunkie codejunkie
item.description:
@codejunkie wrote:

There is a problem with model/ item;location;npc i added public npc;item;location(){} etc to quiet the compiler
when a user creates their account plays it etc and they log out that is fine. Then when they log back in using the unmodded client it said “error loading your profile please contact customer service”

and maybe help me fix this.
log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.executor.ExecutorFilter).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.

Anyone who solves this problem will have the right to call themselves a coding master
i’m completely stumped

using:GazaaScape 562
link:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=494523.0
NO MODS WERE MADE TO THE SERVER
Modded client to change ip but that’s not affecting anything
